questions.text: Where was the meteor crash that Barry was investigating?
questions.explanation:
Downtown Central City.

	The "meteor" was just outside of Star City. When Barry went to investigate it turned out to be a crashed spaceship. While investigating, the ship opened and several aliens rushed out of the ship.

questions.text: What was the alien race that landed on Earth called?
questions.explanation:
The Dominators.

	This was at least the second time the Dominators had landed on Earth.  Lyla Michaels told Barry and his team that they had came to Earth in the 1950s as well. Lyla is the director of Argus.

questions.text: Who was the first hero that Barry recruited to help fight the aliens?
questions.explanation:
Green Arrow.

	After getting the Green Arrow on board, he got help from the rest of Oliver's team, the entire cast of "Legends of Tomorrow" and Supergirl.

questions.text: Since the last time Barry and Oliver crossed over on their shows, Oliver was elected to a public office. What was he elected to?
questions.explanation:
Mayor of Star City.

	On his own show, "Arrow", he spent the entire fifth season up to the point of this episode learning how to be a superhero and run the city. His sister, Thea AKA Speedy, was serving as his chief of staff.

questions.text: Supergirl is from an alternate or parallel universe. What do they call the "Earth" she is from?
questions.explanation:
Earth-38.

	The Flash and Supergirl had crossed over the previous season when Barry accidently crossed the dimensional barrier. Knowing he needed help, he and Cisco sought her out to help fight the aliens. On "The Flash" they have explored many alternate universes, giving each a different number to identify it.

questions.text: Who was chosen as the team leader?
questions.explanation:
Barry.

	Oliver is the most experienced and the natural leader, but he chose to cede leadership to Barry because he Barry had put the team together. Oliver basically still led the team through their practice sessions against Supergirl, simply by telling Barry what the team needed to do.

questions.text: What did Barry reveal to the team right before they headed out to fight the aliens?
options: He had killed three humans in cold blood.
questions.explanation:
He had changed the timeline.

	He told them about "Flashpoint", which is what the team on "The Flash" had been dealing with all season prior to the crossover event. The team lost confidence in Barry, and left him and Oliver behind when they went off to fight the Dominators for the first time.

questions.text: During the first attack from the aliens, what prominent politician was killed?
questions.explanation:
U.S. President

	The president was kidnapped and later killed. He was taken out of his limousine while leaving a meeting with Lyla. When the heroes tried to rescue him, the aliens killed him rather than allowing him to be rescued.

questions.text: The aliens used a mind control device on all but two of the heros. Which two weren't affected?
questions.explanation:
Barry and Oliver.

	Barry and Oliver had stayed behind at S.T.A.R. Labs, and because of that weren't affected when the aliens used the device on the rest of the team. The team returned to the lab and attacked Barry and Oliver. Eventually Barry tricked Supergirl into destroying the device that was controlling them. Wally West was also not affected by the mind control, but he hadn't officially joined the team yet.

questions.text: Who won the race between Supergirl (Kara) and The Flash (Barry)?
questions.correct: Barry & barry allen & flash & the flash
questions.explanation:
Barry & barry allen & flash & the flash.

	Barry managed to outrun her, but he had help with the knowledge of where they were running to. He stopped a couple of times to point out that she was too slow, which only made her angry. It was through making her angry that he managed to trick her into destroying the mind control device that was hidden in the salt mines under the city.
